name: The jet black bracers of death
data: It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sense weakness'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'spacial manipulation'.
These bracers enhance the probability of doing death damage.
These bracers modify the skill 'spacial manipulation'.
These bracers modify the skill 'sense weakness.'
These bracers are more powerful when worn by a true spellweaver.
